thought: I will implement the parameters for the Google Drive file search action to find the file '00005_code.txt' inside the folder found by folder search. The input_data will contain the folder ID from the previous step, so I will use a query string with the folderId and filename.
plan: Set searchMethod to 'query' for advanced search.
Use queryString to search for file name '00005_code.txt' and folderId from input data.
Set returnAll to false and limit to 1 to get only one file.
Test with example input after implementation.
criticism: Currently, the file search action has no parameters, so it won't find the file inside the folder. The query string must be carefully constructed with '=' prefix and proper interpolation.

tool_input.comments: Search for file '00005_code.txt' in the folder found by folder search
